name: Bullet Age (itch)
description: This is the first multiplayer shooter developed by the fluffy dino group and we are proud to say that it is as chaotic as we could have wanted. We give you Bullet Age a fast paced, all v all, 2D multiplayer shooter. In bullet age you will select your character and give them a variety of head wear. You can then choose to make a custom game for others to join or join a random lobby. it is completely up to you. We hope you enjoy our new game, bare in mind it is in very early access so expect bugs and glitches (if you find them please comment what they are for us so we can fix them as quickly as possible).
